name: The Happy Cow
description:
This game was created through the B.E.A.N.S Game Jam hosted by Glasgow Caledonian University. The aim of this jam was to tackle the area of how food agriculture is affecting our climate.

Happy Cow is designed to be a story-driven 2D side-scrolling platformer, where narration aids the player in furthering Happy's story and introduces a serious conversation in a light-hearted manner.

Developed by:

Patrick Carranza, Niall Ewart, Sam McArthur-McLean, & Craig Bevan.

Additional thanks to James Paton & Marcus Rose.
